channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I’m fed up’: My selfish mother-in-law has controlled me for 30 years. How can I regain my power?
item.description: “I’m almost 50 years old. Enough is enough. I am exhausted by it.”

item.title: Here are 5 key charts that defined a wild year for global financial markets

item.title: I’m afraid my financial adviser will steal my money. I’ve read too many cautionary tales. How can I be sure?
item.description: “I am 66 years old and have been retired for about a year and a half.”

item.title: Is the Times Square New Year’s Eve ball drop on your bucket list? Here’s why life goals like that aren’t worth the time or money.
item.description: And you can skip swimming with the dolphins, too.

item.title: ‘So much for holiday cheer’: I saw a guest take a bottle of wine as they left a Christmas party. Do I tell the host?
item.description: “I guess he thought no one would notice. It came in a gift bag, and it looked expensive.”

item.title: The market bubble heading into 2026 may not be AI. It could be this metal
item.description: Silver has gained more than 140% this year and is on pace for its best annual performance since 1979.

item.title: Retail investors close out one of their best years ever. How they beat Wall Street at its own game
item.description: Mom-and-pop investors bought the dip at key points, giving them outsized benefits from the market's run this year.

item.title: Investor Dan Niles shares his top 5 stock picks for 2026
item.description: Dan Niles listed Cisco Systems as a way for investors to "keep riding the AI wave" in 2026.
